post.summary: Provide admin permissions to access team account.
post.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of admins with permission to access team.
get.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

delete.summary: Delete permissions of multiple admins to access team.
delete.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

patch.summary: Change role of admin in accessing team account.
patch.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

delete.summary: Delete permission for admin to access team.
delete.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific account, including AccountQuanta field.
get.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

post.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

patch.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

get.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

post.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

patch.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

get.summary: Retrieve the personal account for specified admin.
get.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

get.summary: Retrieve all accounts accessible by an admin.
get.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of accounts based on query filter, including field AccountQuanta.
get.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

get.summary: Retrieve specific role/permission for admin to access team (admin specified with handle).
get.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

get.summary: List all team accounts for which admin has permission to access.
get.description: Account is typically 'epicenter' and project is typically 'manager'.

patch.summary: Update one or more fields in the account.
patch.description: Specify objectType 'team' to update TeamAccount or 'personal' to update PersonalAccount.

get.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.

delete.description: Project is typically the wild card 'project', which is ignored. Note that header 'X-Forio-Confirmation' must be set to true.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of accounts based on query filter.
get.description: Project is typically 'manager' but is ignored.  The filter string takes in list of search conditions AND'd together, separated by semicolons.

allowDeletion.comment: Determines whether a project may be deleted.

allowWorldSelfAssign.comment: Determines whether or not users may assign their own worlds/roles.

sessionTimeoutSeconds.comment: Seconds idle time before run is removed from remory.

channelEnabled.comment: Determines whether or not the push channel is enabled.

multiPlayerEnabled.comment: Determines whether or not multiplayer features are enabled.

concurrentRunLimit.comment: Number of concurrent runs allowed in project.

modelFile.comment: Name of model file for project-wide server-side model (e.g. index.js).

allowSubmitScore.comment: Determines whether or not a user may submit their own score.

allowWorldCreation.comment: Determines whether or not a user may create their own world.

allowChannelGroupDefault.comment: Determines whether or not the push channel is enabled.

active.comment: Determines if project can be used.

published.comment: Determines if project runs on production or sandbox resources. Not currently used (future configuration option).

allowWorldReset.comment: Determines whether or not a user may reset the run for their world.

phylogeny.comment: Compatibility level affecting a variety of features. Typically left at creation default.

shortName.comment: Unique short name for project, used as part of URL.

approximateRunCount.comment: Cumulative number of runs since the simulations was created (may lag slightly).

dataRetentionDays.comment: Default number of days to retain data for this project.

approximateMemberCount.comment: Sum of members of all projects. May lag slightly from actual sum.

approximateGroupCount.comment: Approximate count of groups across all projects.

approximateRunCount.comment: Approximate count of runs across all projects.

allowDeletion.comment: Determines if this account can be deleted.

active.comment: Determines if the account can be used.

allowAmbiguousHandles.comment: Determines if a handle can be reused for a admin and a user in this account.

com.forio.epicenter.skeleton.persistence.comment: Configuration related to data, user, group retention preferences.

inactiveUserRetentionDays.comment: Maximum number of days to retain inactive users.

dataRetentionDays.comment: Maximum number of days to retain data for this account.

active.comment: Determines if the account can be used.

shortName.comment: Unique short name for account, used as part of URL.

allowAmbiguousHandles.comment: Determines if a handle can be reused for a admin and a user in this account.

authenticatedProjectLimit.comment: Maximum number of authenticated projects allowed for this account.

maximumUsers.comment: Maximum number of users allowed for this account.

allowMultiPlayer.comment: Determines if multiplayer features are allowed for this account.

com.forio.epicenter.skeleton.persistence.comment: API settings used for compatibility with legacy projects.

blockDirectApiCalls.comment: Blocks all API calls originating from internet, based on internal request header.

channelAuthorizationRequired.comment: Determines whether the push channel requires authorization.

showEmail.comment: Determines whether or not to show email address tied to runs in Run API.

dataApiAllowAnonymousAccess.comment: Determines whether or not anonymous access to Data API is allowed.

authorizationMode.comment: Adjusts permissions to share data for all users in group or per individual user.

com.forio.epicenter.skeleton.persistence.comment: Authentication and single sign-on configuration parameters

defaultGroupName.comment: The default group used to place users auto-created after single signon.

autoCreatePlayer.comment: After single signon, create the user if doesn't already exist.

loginFile.comment: Redirection destination after logout, timeout or unsuccessful authentication.

groupFile.comment: Redirection destination used to select a group after authentication.

com.forio.epicenter.skeleton.persistence.comment: Configuration related to data, user, group retention preferences.

dataRetentionDays.comment: Maximum number of days to retain data for this account.
